text: Paul Stannard (17 January 1895 – 24 November 1982) was an English professional footballer who played as a forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1895 births Category:1982 deaths Category:People from Warwick Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Tamworth F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:South Shields F.C.
